document.title: Municipal Law Enforcement Management Report 1989 No. 2: Managing Liability Exposure: A Model for Law Enforcement
document.abstract: Learning methods to address liability exposure are required for municipal managers to act effectively. This report is intended to heighten the awareness of local municipal managers by reviewing causes of liability and outlining risk reduction strategies.
